title: If curfew lifted tomorrow, 5 hour power-cut may be imposed: PUCSL
body_lines: If the police curfew is lifted tomorrow, power cut hours will be increased to five hours due to unavailability of fuel and excess demand, the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said.
They said if the police curfew continuous for tomorrow the power cuts will remain unchanged for three hour and 20 minutes. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
